name: scitex-cloud
description: SciTeX Cloud - Collaborative Scientific Writing Platform
__WARNING__: DO NOT BUILD TYPESCRIPT ON HOST! See RULES/02_TYPESCRIPT_HOT_BUILDING_IN_DEVELOPMENT.md
__BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS__: TypeScript builds INSIDE Docker container via tsc --watch. Edit .ts files on host, let container compile automatically. Running npm scripts on host will cause permission conflicts and is not part of the intended workflow.

scripts.build:all: node check-build-environment.js && tsc -p tsconfig.all.json && node post-build.js
scripts.build:project: node check-build-environment.js && tsc -p tsconfig.project.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='../apps/project_app/static/project_app/js/apps/project_app/static/project_app/ts';const dst='../apps/project_app/static/project_app/js';if(fs.existsSync(src)){const cp=require('child_process');cp.execSync('cp -r '+src+'/* '+dst+'/');cp.execSync('rm -rf ../apps/project_app/static/project_app/js/apps ../apps/project_app/static/project_app/js/static');}"
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:writer && npm run clean:project
